= Counter

[,tsx,title="App.tsx"]
----
import { useState } from 'react'

export default function App() {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);

  const onAdd = () => {
    setCount(count + 1);
  }

  const onSub = () => {
    setCount(count - 1);
  }

  const onReset = () => {
    setCount(0);
  }

  return (
    <>
      <button onClick={ onAdd }>+</button>
      <div>{ count }</div>
      <button onClick={ onSub }>-</button>
      <button onClick={ onReset }>Reset</button>
    </>
  )
}
----
